```

  ✖ Do not reassign catch parameters.

    try { } catch (e) { e; e = 10; }
                           ^

  ℹ Use a local variable instead.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
```
